title: 港大邊科最有機會轉去醫科

replies.msg: 如果dse唔夠分數入medic，或者副學位畢業之後學分未足以入讀呢科但就入左港大其他科，想問下港大邊d學科例如biochemistry , nursing , biomedical sciences , etc , 係讀左一年之後最大機會成功轉去醫科？
Dentistry

如果dse唔夠分數入medic，或者副學位畢業之後學分未足以入讀呢科但就入左港大其他科，想問下港大邊d學科例如biochemistry , nursing , biomedical sciences , etc , 係讀左一年之後最大機會成功轉去醫科？


港大唔係有毅行醫路??
HKU second chance medicine

我打算出年參加
HKDSE 有考phy chem bio m2 (好似4以上就ok)

港大應該冇可能轉到
中大就聽過，大概一年有幾個轉到，要gpa好高+ interview好勁先得，多數讀biomedic, biochem, nursing, public health呢啲相關科

我今年grad
但我都唔覺會易得去邊，其實姐係non-jupas 姐，又係乜人都玩得

https://www.med.hku.hk/philanthropy/support-the-next-generation


Second Chance

Starting from the 2016 intake, the Faculty will be introducing a new scheme called “Second Chance”. This admission route will be open to all comers, including high school leavers from previous years, as well as degree holders. The scheme is sympathetic to those who show a deep, sustained and demonstrable conviction to become a humane practitioner, despite setbacks and detours in their earlier professional and academic journeys. Those who had not previously applied but have now identified medicine, pharmacy, nursing, or Chinese medicine as a newfound career choice for laudable reasons will also be welcomed.

The Scholarship aims to provide support to students of the Faculty who have demonstrated extraordinary resilience to make a mature but never too late entry to healthcare profession.

Prizes
With the generosity of donors who wish to recognize and reward excellence at the Faculty, a number of prizes are offered to students at undergraduate and postgraduate levels in recognition of their academic performance. Learn more to establish a prize at the Faculty.

Contact the Faculty Office for more information: Ms Candy Wong (3917 9474/ candywhy@hku.hk)

港大應該冇可能轉到
中大就聽過，大概一年有幾個轉到，要gpa好高+ interview好勁先得，多數讀biomedic, biochem, nursing, public health呢啲相關科

差啲漏左，港大trans就唔得，但係今年hku biomedical science多左條路，gpa夠高可以比你year 3讀定medic野，grad左之後比你讀mbbs 4年，總共4+4=8年

https://www.med.hku.hk/philanthropy/support-the-next-generation


Second Chance

唔該巴打，聽日send email 問間先
毅行醫路真係我最後一次one more chance

毅行醫路真係我最後一次one more chance

我覺得你都係唔好當最後一次
上報果兩個，一個好似係ibank, 一個係外國讀pharm, 都apply左幾次先收

用second chance 入嘅多數已有一個degree (bachelor/master) ，好多都同health science 有關(eg dentistry, neuro)

想second chance 可以先讀一個degree

樓主如果degree都未開始讀，建議得retake
你retake 三年考6科5**其實無難度，折完仲高過lowest

second chance難度會去到邊？
好似講到有degree就玩得
成班講到好易入咁 入到去你都讀唔黎啦 我就唔信你一take 就得
Asso仔就唔好諗咁多啦
